update technology_plan set technology_id = #{technologyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, batch_amount = #{batchAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_plan = #{startPlan,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_plan = #{endPlan,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, commit_plan = #{commitPlan,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, technology_plan_start = #{technologyPlanStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, technology_plan_end = #{technologyPlanEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where technology_plan_id = #{technologyPlanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: tp.technology_plan_id, tp.technology_id, t.technology_name, tp.batch_amount, tp.start_plan, tp.end_plan, tp.commit_plan, tp.technology_plan_start, tp.technology_plan_end
mapper.select:
select
from technology_plan tp left join technology t on tp.technology_id = t.technology_id
select count(tp.technology_plan_id) from technology_plan tp left join technology t on tp.technology_id = t.technology_id

select
from technology_plan tp left join technology t on tp.technology_id = t.technology_id where tp.technology_plan_id like concat("%", #{searchValue}, "%")
select count(tp.technology_plan_id) from technology_plan tp left join technology t on tp.technology_id = t.technology_id where tp.technology_plan_id like concat("%", #{searchValue}, "%")

select
from technology_plan tp left join technology t on tp.technology_id = t.technology_id where t.technology_name like concat("%", #{searchValue}, "%")
select count(tp.technology_plan_id) from technology_plan tp left join technology t on tp.technology_id = t.technology_id where t.technology_name like concat("%", #{searchValue}, "%")
